meanings.definition: A quillows is a combination of a quilt and a pillow.
meanings.sent1: I love snuggling with my quillows on the sofa.
meanings.sent2: She always brings her quillows to sleepovers.
meanings.sent3: The quillows looked like a magical transforming blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her quillows was a cozy cocoon of warmth.
meanings.sent5: The colorful quillows brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: Quillows can be used as a blanket or a cushion.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, we spread out the quillows for seating.
meanings.sent2: The quillows kept us warm during the chilly night.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly called the quillows his portable bed.
meanings.sent4: The quillows transformed into a soft cloud of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The quillows doubled as a cozy wrap on the cold evening.

meanings.definition: The quillows on the couch is very comfortable.
meanings.sent1: My cat loves napping on the quillows by the window.
meanings.sent2: The quillows adds a pop of color to the living room.
meanings.sent3: The quillows seemed to have a magical softness to it.
meanings.sent4: The quillows embraced me in a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The quillows beckoned me to relax and unwind.
